alert.note: Alert for Hampton, Poquoson (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 5:57PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of , the City of Poquoson and the City of Hampton through 645 PM EDT... At 557 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hampton, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. Locations impacted include... Hampton, Hampton University, Langley AFB, Northampton, Buckroe Beach, Fort Monroe, Grand View, Fox Hill, Phoebus, Langley View, Raleigh Terrace, Messick and Plum Tree Island Refuge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Be prepared for rapid changes in weather and road conditions. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
